price: 3. Markaas ku tasbiixso Ammaanaha Rabbigaa, weydiisona Denbi Dhaaf. Hubaal Alle waa Toobad aqbal Badane.
arabic: فَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرۡهُۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ تَوَّابَۢا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fasabbiḥ biḥamdi rabbika wa-is'taghfir'hu innahu kāna tawwāban
